<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=311) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 133 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[[Druid](/Classes.aspx?ID=6)] [animal order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You gain the service of a [young animal companion](/animal-companions) that travels with you on your adventures and obeys any simple commands you give it to the best of its abilities. See [Animal Companions](/Rules.aspx?ID=149) for more information.

**[Ranger](/Classes.aspx?ID=9)**: When you [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10), your animal companion gains the action's benefits and your hunter's edge benefit if you have one.

<title level="2">Animal Companion leads to...</title>
[Apex Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1160), [Masterful Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=543), [Mature Animal Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=322), [Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=508), [Side by Side (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=339), [Stealthy Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=532)
name: Animal Companion
